CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(FluidRecipeId__c)), ISNUMBER(FluidRecipeId__c), LEN(FluidRecipeId__c) = 8 ), 'https://configure-imagecomposer.fluidretail.net/recipe/' + FluidRecipeId__c + '/image/Front.jpg', IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(FluidRecipeId__c)), NOT(ISNUMBER(FluidRecipeId__c)), UPPER(LEFT(FluidRecipeId__c, 1)) = 'T', LEN(FluidRecipeId__c) = 8 ), 'https://lv-api.3kit.com/api/configurations/' + FluidRecipeId__c + '/image/Front', ProductCatalogue__r.Image1Url__c ) ) /* IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(FluidRecipeId__c)), 'http://configure-imagecomposer.fluidretail.net/recipe/' + FluidRecipeId__c + '/image/Front.jpg', ProductCatalogue__r.Image1Url__c ) */
CustomField.label: Fluid Image Font
